title: Recurring meeting registration link is live!
body:
Hi everyone!
For anyone who wants to register for the biweekly automating assessment townhall series, you can [register here.](https://gsa.zoomgov.com/meeting/register/FpW3sJuBRxag_1Mz49J0Cw) The registration link on the README has also been updated to reflect this recurring meeting series. 

As previously stated, these townhall meetings will be primarily for recapping themes and updates from the GitHub Discussion board, as well as possible demos, updates from the PMO, etc. 

**Everything that happens in the meetings will also be posted here, in GitHub discussions, to allow for maximal transparency and participation.** You do not need to attend the meetings to stay up to date, and recordings will be posted on the [repository README.](github.com/fedramp/automating-assessment-cwg/README.md)
